other_abnormalities.description: Large right-sided subdural hematoma with significant mass effect, causing midline shift and compression of the ventricles.
Possible intraparenchymal hemorrhage within the right hemisphere

recommended_follow_up: Immediate neurosurgical consultation for evaluation and management of the subdural hematoma and intraparenchymal hemorrhage.
Repeat imaging (CT or MRI) after intervention to assess hematoma evacuation and brain parenchyma.
Neurological assessment to determine the extent of neurological deficits.
